name: Astro Bot: Stellar Speedway
summary:
Free DLC that brings new speedrun levels and bots to rescue. It has weekly release schedule:

- Oct 17: Building Speed
- Oct 24: Let it Slide
- Oct 31: Spring-loaded Run
- Nov 7: Helium Heights
- Nov 14: Rising Heat

Each new level offers two brand-new Special Bots for you to rescue.
